TopicTitle: Upcoming refueling/resources/atmosphere system impact on mods

Articles.Content: Does anyone have any info as to how to the upcoming refueling resources system will impact Karbonite and Interstellar ISRU? Will they integrate, will one replace the other? What about FAR and the new atmosphere system?

FAR just replaces the stock aero. it may take some doing but it's possible that the it will continue to keep doing so; if the 0.90 stock aero isn't up to ferram's standards then he'll likely keep maintaining it
